casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE 606A05-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 30, 2016

Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, dor Lane, Eric Glenn.

Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of September 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of September 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 11th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
